snippet: As teams compile more and more information on hitters’ trends, managers can predict more accurately than ever where ground balls are most likely to go and can shift around their infielders.
abstract: Extra Bases; as teams compile more and more information on hitters’ trends, managers can predict more accurately than ever where ground balls are most likely to go and can shift around their infielders; in this new frontier of defensive positioning, teams are learning as they go; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: As teams compile more and more information on hitters’ trends, managers can predict more accurately than ever where ground balls are most likely to go and can shift around their infielders.

headline.main: A Rapidly Shifting Philosophy of Infield Play
headline.print_headline: A Rapidly Shifting Philosophy of Infield Play
